name: LASER MAGE MANSION DEFENSE
description:
You are the

L A S E R M A G E

Will you resist the

H O R D E

of hellish creatures trying to stop you from

D E P A R T I N G

?

(Use your mouse and destroy them)

This game is for One Minute Jam and it's just an old concept we weren't able to develop before. Now here it is!

A bit late for Halloween, but quite in-mood with this November! And as every jam game, we look forward to port it to mobile in some way, sooner or later!
